channel.title: NpC sPeEcH
channel.description:
[b]Question:[/b] [i]I'd like to ask the people of moparscape community. I've got a simple question, how do you make the npc dialogue do something.[/i]
[b]Example:[/b] [i]When you click yes on the bank dialogue it opens up the bank.[/i]
[b]Question Two:[/b] [i]Is it possible to make it on my own.[/i]
[b]Example Two:[/b] [i]I've made a npc dialogue. It says something, then it says yes or no. I would like it to make me go to varrock if i click yes.[/i]
[b]Credits:[/b] [i]I Am Noob.[/i]
[i]Thankyou.[/i]

item.title: NpC sPeEcH
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

[quote=“i am noob, post:2, topic:83033”]search for case 9157:

and under it:

					if (NpcDialogue == CASEIDOFYES/NOOPTION) {
						NpcDialogue = 0;
						NpcDialogueSend = false;
						        teleportToX = COORDS;
                                                            teleportToY = COORDS;
					}[/quote]

Thankyou!

Read full topic

item.title: NpC sPeEcH
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

Question: I’d like to ask the people of moparscape community. I’ve got a simple question, how do you make the npc dialogue do something.

Example: When you click yes on the bank dialogue it opens up the bank.

Question Two: Is it possible to make it on my own.

Example Two: I’ve made a npc dialogue. It says something, then it says yes or no. I would like it to make me go to varrock if i click yes.

Credits: I Am Noob.

Thankyou.

Read full topic
